messages.subject: Nobuiye -- Thanks All...
messages.msgSnippet: I really appreciate all the posts on the Nobuiye question. Jim -- I ll go to Nakamura and look for what you recommended and correlate it with Torigoye/Haynes
messages.messageBody:
I really appreciate all the posts on the Nobuiye question.
Jim -- I'll go to Nakamura and look for what you recommended and
correlate it with Torigoye/Haynes' notes on the generations (I have the
copy Craig Harris had) then fit it together with the Tsuba Geijutsu.
You're definately right -- not easy. I was hoping there might be a
text specifically on Nobuiye in English but if you are aware of a
Japanese text please let me know.
Rich -- when you have time I'd appreciate the file -- much thanks!
David -- thank you for the reference!
Milt -- go floss! (LOL) Just kidding.
There is a nice set of pics on www.jpsword.com under Nobuiye also.
As usual the captions are in Japanese.
Later!
